# KWCChangepoint

A user-friendly R package for functional and multivariate changepoint
detection. This package is in the process of being submitted to
[CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/). This page will be filled with more
information regarding the package, its functionalities, and the theory
underlying it all. Stay tuned!

## Installation

To install the developmental version of this package on your device, run
the following two lines in your Rstudio.

``` r
install.packages("devtools") #if devtools is not already installed
devtools::install_github("adeeb99/KWCChangepoint")
```

## Contact Info:

For any questions or feedback, feel free to reach me at
<adeeb.rouhani@gmail.com>

# Package index

## All functions

- [`amoc_test()`](https://adeeb99.github.io/KWCChangepoint/reference/AMOC_test.md)
  : Conduct an AMOC hypothesis test
- [`dwbs()`](https://adeeb99.github.io/KWCChangepoint/reference/DWBS.md)
  : Find changepoints using depth-based wild binary segmentation
- [`epidemic_test()`](https://adeeb99.github.io/KWCChangepoint/reference/Epidemic_test.md)
  : Test for an epidemic period in data
- [`fkwc()`](https://adeeb99.github.io/KWCChangepoint/reference/FKWC.md)
  : Detect changepoints in functional data
- [`fkwc_multisample()`](https://adeeb99.github.io/KWCChangepoint/reference/FKWC_multisample.md)
  : Multisample hypothesis test for difference in covariance operators
- [`fkwc_posthoc()`](https://adeeb99.github.io/KWCChangepoint/reference/FKWC_posthoc.md)
  : Post-hoc hypothesis test for difference in covariance operators.
- [`KWCChangepoint`](https://adeeb99.github.io/KWCChangepoint/reference/KWCChangepoint-package.md)
  [`KWCChangepoint-package`](https://adeeb99.github.io/KWCChangepoint/reference/KWCChangepoint-package.md)
  : KWCChangepoint: Robust Changepoint Detection for Functional and
  Multivariate Data
- [`mkwp()`](https://adeeb99.github.io/KWCChangepoint/reference/MKWP.md)
  : Find changepoints in multivariate data
- [`fmri_changepoints()`](https://adeeb99.github.io/KWCChangepoint/reference/fmri_changepoints.md)
  : Detect changepoints in a resting state fMRI scan
- [`uni_mean()`](https://adeeb99.github.io/KWCChangepoint/reference/uni_mean.md)
  : Find mean changes in a univariate sequence
- [`uni_scale()`](https://adeeb99.github.io/KWCChangepoint/reference/uni_scale.md)
  : Find scale changes in a univariate sequence
